Address.value: 11 HURLEY STREET, CAMBRIDGE, Massachusetts, 02141, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Editas Medicine Inc is a gene-editing company. It is engaged in treating patients with genetically defined diseases by correcting disease-causing genes. The company focuses on developing a proprietary genome editing platform based on clustered, regularly interspaced short palindromic repeats (CRISPR)/ CRISPR-associated protein 9 (Cas9 technology). It has developed CRISPR/Cas9 technology which uses a protein-RNA (ribonucleic acid) complex composed of the Cas9 enzyme bound to a guide RNA molecule designed to recognize a DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) sequence that requires repair. The company's only operating segment is developing and commercializing genome editing technology.

value.name: Mei Baisong
